00037 namespace RDK2 { namespace Serialization { namespace Binary {
00038             
00039         Buffer nbo_i16(int16_t v){
00040             uint16_t network = htons( v );
00041             return Buffer( (char*)&network, 2);
00042         }
00043         Buffer nbo_i32(int32_t v){
00044             uint32_t network = htonl( v );
00045             return Buffer( (char*)&network, 4);
00046         }
00047         
00048         Buffer nbo_f32(float32_t v){
00049             volatile float32_t a = v;
00050             volatile uint32_t network = htonl(*reinterpret_cast<volatile uint32_t*>(&a));
00051             return Buffer( (char*)&network, 4);
00052         }
00053 
00054 /*
00055         Buffer nbo_f64(float64_t v){
00056             char network[8];
00057             // non sono proprio sicuro di questo
00058             ((int32_t*) network)[0] = htonl( ((int32_t*)&v)[0]);  
00059             ((int32_t*) network)[1] = htonl(((int32_t*)&v)[1]);
00060             return Buffer( network, 8);
00061         }
00062 */
00063 
00065         Buffer nbo_f64(float64_t v){
00066             Buffer p; 
00067                 if(v == DBL_MAX) {
00068                     float32_t a = FLT_MAX;
00069                     float32_t b = 0;
00070                     p.append(nbo_f32(a));
00071                     p.append(nbo_f32(b));
00072                 } else if( RDK_ISINF(v) ) {
00073                         float32_t a = RDK_INF32;
00074                         float32_t b = 0;
00075                         p.append(nbo_f32(a));
00076                         p.append(nbo_f32(b));
00077                 } else {
00078                     float32_t a = (float32_t) v;
00079                     float32_t b = (float32_t) (v-a);
00080                     p.append(nbo_f32(a));
00081                     p.append(nbo_f32(b));
00082                 }
00083             return p;
00084         }

00088         Buffer packet_i8(int8_t c) {
00089             Buffer packet;
00090                 packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_INT8);
00091                 packet.push_back(c);    
00092             return packet;
00093         }
00094         
00095         Buffer packet_u8(uint8_t c) {
00096             Buffer packet;
00097                 packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_INT8);
00098                 packet.push_back(c); 
00099             return packet;
00100         }
00101         
00102         Buffer packet_i16(int16_t c) {
00103                 Buffer packet;
00104                 packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_INT16);
00105                 packet.append(nbo_i16(c));
00106             return packet;
00107         }
00108

00110             Buffer packet;
00111                 packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_INT32);
00112                 packet.append(nbo_i32(c));
00113             return packet;
00114         }

00117         Buffer packet_f32(float32_t d) {
00118                 Buffer packet;
00119                 packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_FLOAT32);
00120                 packet.append(nbo_f32(d) );
00121             return packet;
00122         }
00123         
00124         Buffer packet_f64(float64_t d) {
00125             Buffer packet;
00126                 packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_FLOAT64);
00127                 packet.append(nbo_f64(d)); 
00128             return packet;

00130         
00131         Buffer packet_bytes(const void*v, size_t n) {
00132             Buffer packet;
00133                 packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT8);
00134                 packet.append(nbo_i32(n));
00135                 packet.append( Buffer( (const char*) v, n) );
00136             return packet;
00137         }
00138         
00139         Buffer packet_string(cstr s) {
00140             Buffer packet;
00141             packet.push_back(PACKET_HEADER_STRING);
00142             packet.append(nbo_i32(s.length()));
00143             if(s.length()>0)
00144                 packet.append(s);
00145             return packet;
00146         }
00147         
00148         Buffer packet_objectWithClass(cstr className, unsigned char version, Buffer payload){
00149             Buffer name = packet_string(className);
00150             int length = name.length() + payload.length() + 1;
00151             Buffer packet;
00152             packet.push_back( PACKET_HEADER_OBJECTWITHCLASS );
00153             packet.append( nbo_i32(length) );
00154             packet.append( 1, *((char*)&version) );
00155             packet.append( name );
00156             packet.append( payload );
00157             return packet;
00158         }
00159 
00160         
00161         Buffer packet_objectWithoutClass(Buffer payload){
00162             int length = payload.length();
00163             Buffer packet;
00164             packet.push_back( PACKET_HEADER_OBJECTNOCLASS );
00165             packet.append( nbo_i32(length) );
00166             packet.append( payload );
00167             return packet;
00168         }
00169         
00170         Buffer packet_i16(const int16_t*v, size_t n) {
00171             Buffer packet;
00172             packet.push_back( PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT16);
00173             packet.append( nbo_i32(n) );
00174             for(size_t i=0;i<n;i++)
00175                 packet.append(nbo_i16(v[i]));
00176             
00177             assert(packet.length() == (size_t) 1+4+2*n );
00178             return packet;
00179         }
00180         
00181         Buffer packet_i32(const int32_t*v, size_t n){
00182             Buffer packet;
00183             packet.push_back( PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT32);
00184             packet.append( nbo_i32(n) );
00185             for(size_t i=0;i<n;i++)
00186                 packet.append(nbo_i32(v[i]));
00187             
00188             assert(packet.length() == (size_t) 1+4+4*n );
00189             return packet;
00190         }
00191         
00192         Buffer packet_f32(const float32_t*v, size_t n){
00193             Buffer packet;
00194             packet.push_back( PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_FLOAT32);
00195             packet.append( nbo_i32(n) );
00196             for(size_t i=0;i<n;i++)
00197                 packet.append(nbo_f32(v[i]));
00198             
00199             assert(packet.length() == (size_t)  1+4+4*n );
00200             return packet;
00201         }
00202         
00203         Buffer packet_f64(const float64_t*v, size_t n){
00204             Buffer packet;
00205             packet.push_back( PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_FLOAT64);
00206             packet.append( nbo_i32(n) );
00207             for(size_t i=0;i<n;i++)
00208                 packet.append(nbo_f64(v[i]));
00209             
00210             assert(packet.length() == (size_t) 1+4+8*n );
00211             return packet;
00212         }

00215     std::string packetName(char c) {
00216         #define CASE(x) case(x): { return #x ; }
00217         switch(c) {
00218             
00219             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_NAME)
00220             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_OBJECTWITHCLASS)
00221             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_OBJECTNOCLASS)
00222             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_OBJECTARRAY)
00223             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_INT8)
00224             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_INT16)
00225             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_INT32)
00226             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_FLOAT32)
00227             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_FLOAT64)
00228             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT8)
00229             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT16)
00230             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_INT32)
00231             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_FLOAT32)
00232             CASE(PACKET_HEADER_ARRAY_FLOAT64)
00233             
00234             default:
00235                 string s("(unknown packet '"); s+=c; s+="')";
00236                 return s;
00237         }
00238     }
